mapper.insert: INSERT INTO theatergrp(theaterno, areano, theater) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(theaterno), 0) + 1 as theaterno FROM theatergrp), #{areano}, #{theater})
mapper.select: SELECT theaterno , theater FROM theatergrp ORDER BY theaterno ASC
SELECT theaterno , areano, theater FROM theatergrp WHERE areano = #{areano} ORDER BY theaterno ASC
